title: Action Learning-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Learners are current professionals, with an environment enabling shared learning experiences and collaboration for organizational problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can systematically define real organizational problems and establish project plans using the Action Learning framework
Learners can apply mathematical modeling techniques to practical problem-solving and perform data-driven decision-making
Learners can design a management system that converts insights derived from Action Learning projects into organizational learning systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
